name: counter-analytics
description: Counter is a privacy-first, self-hosted web analytics platform that tracks visits without cookies. It offers basic stats with a lightweight footprint and focuses entirely on privacy and simplicity.
features: Privacy-First: Track visits without cookies or personal data. Respect user privacy completely.
Lightweight: Minimal footprint with fast page loads. No performance impact.
Simple Analytics: Basic stats that matter without complexity. Focus on essentials.
Cookie-Free: GDPR-compliant tracking without consent banners. Hassle-free compliance.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your analytics data. Your data stays yours.
Easy Setup: Quick deployment with minimal configuration. Start tracking in minutes.
